spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (True or Scaled One Forms Only)
headerEntries: Its innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 22}). The yuan-ti can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (True or Scaled One Forms Only)

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: It can use its action to polymorph into any reptilian beast or humanoid Scaled One, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It doesn't change form if it dies.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: It has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Fear Aura
entries: A sarrukh has an aura of fear in a 15-foot radius. This effect is otherwise identical to the fear spell (save {@dc 19}). A creature that succeeds on the save cannot be affected again by that sarrukh's fear aura for 24 hours. Creatures it deems are allies are immune to this aura. The DC is Charisma-based.

trait.name: War Caster
entries: You have practiced casting spells in the midst of combat, learning techniques that grant you the following benefits: You have advantage on Constitution saving throws that you make to maintain your concentration on a spell when you take damage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day).
entries: If it fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack (True Form Only)
entries: It makes two ranged attacks or three melee attacks, but can use its bite and constrict attacks only once each.

action.name: Trident of the Sarrukh (True Form Only)
entries: +3 Weapon. {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) slashing damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}). Until this grapple ends, the target is half-{@condition stunned}, and it can't constrict another target.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) piercing damage plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Longbow (Abomination Form Only)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Manipulate Form
entries: See source, uses a polymorph innate ability or 5+ spell slot.

bonus.name: Trident of the Sarrukh: Domination
entries: As a bonus action, the trident can be used to cast {@spell Dominate Person} on a target within 10 ft. of the one that was stricken if the creature is smaller than the weilder. The trident holds concentration in this way. It has 3 charges, recharging by {@dice 1d3} at dawn.

reaction.name: Reaction: War Caster
entries: When a hostile creature's movement provokes an opportunity attack from you, you can use your reaction to cast a spell at the creature, rather than making an opportunity attack. The spell must have a casting time of 1 action and must target only that creature.

legendary.name: Move
entries: It moves up to half its movement speed.

legendary.name: Cast a spell
entries: Casts a spell with a casting time of 1 action. Costs a number of actions equal to the spell level.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Make one attack with its trident, bite, or constrict.
